revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=DDR2200-CL |fcc_date=12/22/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |type=wireless router, analog phone gateway, dsl modem |fcc_id=MXF-ADV981119G |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.67 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6358KFBG |cpu2_brand=Broadcom |cpu2_model=BCM6358KFBG |fla1_brand=Spansion |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-5T |ram2=256 |ram2_brand=Nanya |ram2_model=NT5DS16M16CS-5T |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (slave) |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=Gemtek WMIR-174G |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2527 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=none (internal) |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6061 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=HomePNA 3.0 (coaxial), ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1PTV-ADM1N |oui_eth=50:39:55 }} '''DDR2200-CL ADSL2+ Residential Gateway'''
Per FCC photos... *There are two '''Broadcom''' SoCs on the board. **both of which are a BCM6358KFBG *The HomePNA controller is a '''CopperGate''' CG3011QIR-10. *There is a '''Legerity''' chip on-board for VoIP support. *The wireless module has a MAC label w/ a 00:26:82 ('''Gemtek''') MAC on it.
This device is/was used by the following ISPs... *'''{{Used by service|CenturyLink}}'''
Default settings are per the FCC manual. They may very well be inaccurate. :Additional login credentials of support:1PTV-SUPP0RT and user:user are specified. ::'''CenturyLink''' [http://qwest.centurylink.com/internethelp/modem-cisco-ddr2200-wireless-setup.html specifies the user login as user:user].
If the 50:39:55 OUI is used for the WLAN interface, the default SSID format may be '''CiscoXXXX''' (where '''XXXX''' is a number).
The power adapter shown in the FCC external photos is an '''Asian Power Devices Inc.''' DA-30H12 rev 1.2 (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.7A max. -> 12VDC, 2.5A).
